page.title: 10ROTHLEY MEETING PLACES
page.content: {Rothley Green}:Old gentlemen sit with sticks and pipes,elderly ladies with shopping discuss ailments or weather; leather-clad motorbike riders meet in gangs;teenage jean-clad girls hover , hoping to attract the boys.{Fish+Chip {Shop:}Open Tue-Fri 5.30-11pm Sat 6.30 -11pm +Lunchtimes 11.30-1.30pm People of all ages and types-punks show off their latest orange,green or pink spiked hair-do;little old ladies in slippers from nearby cottages;fathers &children queue for quick meals.The road becomes congested with family cars.{Newsagents:}Youths(10-12yrs)with BMXs consume crisps and coke,waiting to deliver local papers for pocket- money.{Church Lych Gate & Bus stop: Youth night-spots with graffiti- covered walls and floors littered with cigarette-ends.{Rothley Centre: } various social events incl.Tea Dances.
